Title: Enhance IT expertise and efficiency with Copilot in Microsoft Intune | BRK320
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Explore how Copilot in Microsoft Intune assists admins in managing complex workflows with new policy management and troubleshooting generative AI functionality. Copilot provides deeper insights from your data, offers actionable guidance, and enhances IT expertise, leading to a more secure environment and efficient, informed decision-making.

To learn more, please check out these resources: \* https://aka.ms/TCL/MicroftSecurity \* https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/security/ \* https://aka.ms/IgniteAITools \* aka.ms/CopilotInIntune\_Ignite\_2024 \* https://aka.ms/Ignite24Collection-IntuneandSecurity 𝗦𝗽𝗲𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿𝘀: \* Carlos Brito \* Amit Ghodke \* Aaron Hamilton \* Archana Devi Sunder Rajan 𝗦𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻: This is one of many sessions from the Microsoft Ignite 2024 event. View even more sessions on-demand and learn about Microsoft Ignite at https://ignite.microsoft.com
